tier1.name: Beetle
tier1.ability1: Eat shop food: Give shop animals +1 Health
tier1.ability2: Eat shop food: Give shop animals +2 Health
tier1.ability3: Eat shop food: Give shop animals +3 Health

tier1.name: Bluebird
tier1.ability1: End turn: Give left-most friend +1 Attack
tier1.ability2: End turn: Give left-most friend +2 Attack
tier1.ability3: End turn: Give left-most friend +3 Attack

tier1.name: Fish
tier1.ability3: Animal is already at max level

tier1.name: Ladybug
tier1.ability1: Buy food: Gain +1/+1 until end of battle
tier1.ability2: Buy food: Gain +2/+2 until end of battle
tier1.ability3: Buy food: Gain +3/+3 until end of battle

tier1.name: Mosquito
tier1.ability1: Start of battle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy
tier1.ability2: Start of battle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy
tier1.ability3: Start of battle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy

tier2.name: Bat
tier2.ability1: Start of battle: Make 1 enemy Weak
tier2.ability2: Start of battle: Make 2 enemies Weak
tier2.ability3: Start of battle: Make 2 enemies Weak

tier2.name: Dog
tier2.ability1: Friend summoned: Gain +1 Attack or +1 Health
tier2.ability2: Friend summoned: Gain +2 Attack or +2 Health
tier2.ability3: Friend summoned: Gain +3 Attack or +3 Health

tier2.name: Dromedary
tier2.ability1: Start of turn: Give shop animals +1/+1
tier2.ability2: Start of turn: Give shop animals +2/+2
tier2.ability3: Start of turn: Give shop animals +3/+3

tier2.name: Flamingo
tier2.ability1: Faint: Give the two friends behind +1/+1
tier2.ability2: Faint: Give the two friends behind +2/+2
tier2.ability3: Faint: Give the two friends behind +3/+3

tier2.name: Rat
tier2.ability1: Faint: Summon one 1/1 Dirty Rat for the opponent that betrays him (1 Damage to front animal on attack)
tier2.ability2: Faint: Summon one 1/1 Dirty Rat for the opponent that betrays him (1 Damage to front animal on attack)
tier2.ability3: Faint: Summon one 1/1 Dirty Rat for the opponent that betrays him (1 Damage to front animal on attack)

tier2.name: Shrimp
tier2.ability1: Friend solt: Give a random friend +1 Health
tier2.ability2: Friend solt: Give a random friend +2 Health
tier2.ability3: Friend solt: Give a random friend +3 Health

tier2.name: Spider
tier2.ability1: Faint: Summon one tier 3 animal as a 2/2
tier2.ability2: Faint: Summon one tier 3 animal as a 4/4
tier2.ability3: Faint: Summon one tier 3 animal as a 6/6

tier2.name: Tabby Cat
tier2.ability1: Eats shop food: Give friends +1 Attack until end of battle
tier2.ability2: Eats shop food: Give friends +2 Attack until end of battle
tier2.ability3: Eats shop food: Give friends +3 Attack until end of battle

tier3.name: Blowfish
tier3.ability1: Hurt: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy
tier3.ability2: Hurt: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy
tier3.ability3: Hurt: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy

tier3.name: Caterpillar
tier3.ability3: Start of battle: Evolve into a Butterfly (Copy stats of highest friend on field)

tier3.name: Hatching Chick
tier3.ability1: End turn: Give +5/+5 to friend ahead until end of battle
tier3.ability2: End turn: Give +2/+2 to friend ahead
tier3.ability3: Start of turn: Give +1 Experience to friend ahead

tier3.name: Puppy
tier3.ability1: End turn: If you have 2 or more gold, gain +2/+2
tier3.ability2: End turn: If you have 2 or more gold, gain +4/+4
tier3.ability3: End turn: If you have 2 or more gold, gain +6/+6

tier3.name: Rabbit
tier3.ability1: Friend eats shop food: Give it +1 Health
tier3.ability2: Friend eats shop food: Give it +2 Health
tier3.ability3: Friend eats shop food: Give it +3 Health

tier3.name: Snail
tier3.ability1: Buy: If you lost last battle, give all friends +2/+1
tier3.ability2: Buy: If you lost last battle, give all friends +4/+2
tier3.ability3: Buy: If you lost last battle, give all friends +6/+3

tier3.name: Tropical Fish
tier3.ability1: End turn: Give adjacent friends +1 Health
tier3.ability2: End turn: Give adjacent friends +2 Health
tier3.ability3: End turn: Give adjacent friends +3 Health
